data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Mingyi, Yin, Haomin, Huang, Sunbin (2014): Du'an Karst of Guangxi: a kingdom of the cavernicolous genus Dongodytes Deuve (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae). ZooKeys 454: 69-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.454.7269, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.454.7269
